akn:section.akn:heading: Art. 93a. Prohibited activities with military recruit or trainee by person in position of special tr

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Any person subject to this chapter— shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Abuse of Position as Military Recruiter.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Any person subject to this chapter— shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.
(c) Consent is not a defense for any conduct at issue in a prosecution under this section (article).
